column4: If you have a 12.04 CD, I believe you can use that as the source to update your existing OS.
It was aimed at anyone updating actually.
you can use do-release-upgrade -p   but you just change your  /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades   to say lts
I noticed in his mount, he has "fmask=0022,dmask=0022" Would those be the mount permissions for accessing the device?
